text: Zed Plus is a 2014 Bollywood drama film directed by Chandraprakash Dwivedi. The film features Adil Hussain as one of many lead characters, including Mona Singh, Mukesh Tiwari, Kulbhushan Kharbanda, Sanjay Mishra, Shivani Tanksale, Vinod Aacharya & Ekavali Khanna. The film released on 28 November 2014 ==Cast== * Aslam Puncturewala: Adil Hussain * Hameeda (Aslam’s Wife): Mona Singh * Habib (Aslam’s Neighbor): Mukesh Tiwari * Hidayatulla: Sanjai Mishra * Prime Minister : Kulbhushan Kharbanda * Inspector Rajesh (Head of Zed Security): Rahul Singh * Fauziya (Habib’s Wife): Shivani Tanksale * J Dixit (OSD to Prime Minister): K. K. Raina * Saeeda (Aslam’s love interest): Ekavali Khanna * News Reporter: Sanjeev Rathore * Chief Minister of Rajasthan: Dr. Anil Rastogi * Assistant of Hidayatulla : Vinod Aacharya == Soundtrack == {| class="wikitable" |+ Soundtrack |- !
